title: Beijing’s Aggressive Campaign Against Japan’s Iron Lady Backfires
description: Communist China and Japan have been engaging in a serious diplomatic dispute over Taiwan for almost a month. While Japan strives to de-escalate tensions, China’s aggressive stance—particularly toward newly-elected Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi—only heightens …
